name: Daily Dew
title: Hydrating Essence Mist
description: Hit refresh. Concentrated extracts of kiwi and grape quench and nourish, drenching skin in a veil of moisture.
description2: DERMATOLOGIST TESTED. NO PARABENS, SULFATES, SYNTHETIC FRAGRANCE OR SYNTHETIC COLOR.
who: Refreshing moisture over or under makeup throughout the day
Streamlining your routine with an essence and toner in one
how: Use as part of skincare routine in between cleansing and essence step. Can also be used throughout the day over makeup.

name: Featherweight
title: Daily Moisturizing Cream
description: This lightweight formula still packs a punch. Avocado protein extract strengthens skin’s own moisture barrier, sealing in hydration to protect and soften skin.
description2: DERMATOLOGIST TESTED. NO PARABENS, SULFATES, SYNTHETIC FRAGRANCE OR SYNTHETIC COLOR.
how: Pump twice to release cream. Swipe it onto fingers and tap cream into your skin in an outward motion.

name: Wide Awake
title: Brightening Eye Cream
description: Brighten up. Date Seed extract illuminates and refreshes the area around the eyes.
description2: DERMATOLOGIST TESTED. NO PARABENS, SULFATES, SYNTHETIC FRAGRANCE OR SYNTHETIC COLOR.
who: Smoothing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
how: Apply cream to the tip of the ring finger. Dot in a 'c' formation to the under eye. Use a tapping motion for maximum absorption.

name: Balancing Act
title: Skin-Smoothing Lotion
description: Find your center. Soothing magnolia vine extracts restore skin’s oil and water balance, hydrating and smoothing  for luminous skin.
description2: DERMATOLOGIST TESTED. NO PARABENS, SULFATES, SYNTHETIC FRAGRANCE OR SYNTHETIC COLOR.
who: Minimizing the appearance of small lines and wrinkles
how: Place moisturizer into the palm of your hand. Using all four fingers apply in an outward circular motion tapping the moisturizer into skin.

name: Freeze Frame
title: Beauty Essence
description: Stop time in its tracks. Pomegranate extract infuses skin with rich moisture, boosting elasticity and firmness.
description2: DERMATOLOGIST TESTED. NO PARABENS, SULFATES, SYNTHETIC FRAGRANCE OR SYNTHETIC COLOR.
who: Smoother, silkier, more supple skin texture
how: Use morning and night. Warm product by emulsifying then press essence into the skin. Use a tapping motion for maximum absorption.

name: Rise + Shine
title: Purifying Cleanser
description: Make a clean break. Apple and peach extracts whisk away impurities without stripping the skin for a fresh, revitalized complexion.
description2: DERMATOLOGIST TESTED. NO PARABENS, SULFATES, SYNTHETIC FRAGRANCE OR SYNTHETIC COLOR.
who: Gently removing makeup and whisking away impurities
how: Rinse face. Squeeze cleanser into the palm of your hand, emulsify, then using a circular motion massage all over face. Rinse off.

name: All Aglow
title: Perfecting Cushion Compact
description: High performance meets weightless coverage. Hydrating, cooling and brightening with a flawless semi-matte finish and an SPF 47/PA++ protection. Airtight cream puff cushion keeps the formula fresh.
who: Protecting skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays
Cooling and brightening skin's overall appearance
Fast and easy application with flawless finish
how:
Use custom puff to gently tap the cushion, encouraging the foundation to come up. From the outside of the face in, gently press the puff against the skin until the desired amount of coverage is achieved.

HOW TO REFILL THE PRODUCT:
1. Press the bottom center with both thumbs.
2. Push the bottom of the container up.
3. Remove the inner container as it pops up.
4. Press refill cushion into the compact case.

name: Spotlight
title: Brightening Mask
description: The future looks bright. Bilberry, licorice and lotus extracts diminish dark spots to uncover natural radiance.
description2: DERMATOLOGIST TESTED. NO PARABENS, SULFATES, SYNTHETIC FRAGRANCE OR SYNTHETIC COLOR.
who: Prepping skin for flawless makeup application
how:
1. First cleanse and tone the face. Unfold mask.
2. Remove one side of mesh. Apply mask to face. Remove second mesh. Smooth to contours of the face.
3. Leave on for 20 minutes.
4. Discard mask and gently tap remaining essence into the skin. Do not wash face.

name: Quench
title: Intense Hydration Mask
description: Like a cool drink of water for the skin. Hyaluronic acid replenishes moisture, while watermelon and aloe naturally hydrate and refresh.
description2: DERMATOLOGIST TESTED. NO PARABENS, SULFATES, SYNTHETIC FRAGRANCE OR SYNTHETIC COLOR.
who: Improving uneven skin tone and texture
Prepping skin for flawless makeup application
how:
1. First cleanse and tone the face. Unfold mask.
2. Remove one side of mesh. Apply mask to face. Remove second mesh. Smooth to contours of the face.
3. Leave on for 20 minutes.
4. Discard mask and gently tap remaining essence into the skin. Do not wash face.
